Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes an occupancy tax in the city of Oneonta
Summary: Authorizes an occupancy tax in the city of Oneonta not to exceed 6%.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing an occupancy tax in the city of Oneonta; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
